nodes.text: A farm, or farmstead, was a piece of land used for various agricultural purposes. Farms on Mandalore grew crops, while arid worlds, such as Tatooine and Ord Mantell, had moisture farms, where moisture vaporators harvested water from the atmosphere. Moisture farmers used this water themselves, such as to irrigate crops grown in underground gardens, or sold it.
Cut Lawquane and his family tended a farm on Saleucami during the Clone Wars.
